title: The Sound and the Silence
description: In one moment Elliot McKnight, loses his scholarship, his girlfriend, and his hearing. Returning back to his hometown of Charlottesville, Virginia as just another "could have been" like his father, unable to connect to anyone...not even himself. Not until he meets Na-Ri Kwon who smiles even though her losses out match his.The closer they get the more inspired he is to play football again despite the odds. But can he shoulder the mountain of pressure from his family, his new team and still be there for the girl who saved him?Love. Family. Football.Choose one.
author: J.J. McAvoy
